 2009-03602009-03-05,  HERITAGE,  ,  , 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the reappointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of MARGARET SMITH of Amherst, Nova Scotia, as a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the National Museum of Science and Technology to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years.
